items.content_html: A minimal web browser developed with **Electron JS**, focusing on **security**, **lightweight design**, and **simplicity**. The project follows **Electron JS security standards**, uses **the minimal necessary dependencies**, and is written in **Vanilla JavaScript and CSS**.
items.title: and75/Medusa-Electron-Browser-beta:  A minimal web browser developed with **Electron JS**, focusing on **security**, **lightweight design**, and **simplicity**. The project follows **Electron JS security standards**, uses **the minimal necessary dependencies**, and is written in **Vanilla JavaScript and CSS**.

items.content_html: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.

items.content_html: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.
items.title: haoxiang-xu/PuPu: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
